title: 30 min Beginner Yoga - Gentle Stretch & Flow Yoga
description:
Join me in this 30 minute full body yoga flow suitable for all experience levels.
❤️ Try my mobile app to get exclusive content! ❤️📱 👉 http://bit.ly/ytmobileapp
🛍️ SHOP MY MERCHANDISE, BOOKS & ONLINE COURSES 🧘👉 https://bit.ly/ywkshop

Hi everyone, thank you for joining me on the mat today! I'm going to take you through this beginner friendly 30 minute full body yoga flow. This is great for those who are new to yoga, students who want to move a bit slower or anyone who wants an effective yet gentle practice. We will have a mix of reclined, seated and standing yoga poses that will help with balance, strength and flexibility.

I'm not using any props in this class so all you need is your mat. However, if you have some blocks at home you can keep them close by and use them to make poses more accessible. Remember to stay connected with your breath and keep the focus inwards. Take breaks when you need them and honor your body.

Enjoy this 30 minute beginner yoga class!

MORE BEGINNER YOGA: https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLW0v0k7UCVrkkg0YPkBqxYHA2eT_IYlAC

Kassandra

comments: I find your classes so helpful, as a 69 year old beginner. The stretching and balance helps me immensely.
That was a nice, chilled class for me and my husband- both in our 70’s🧘🏻‍♀️❤️
It really is nice to do a beginner class no matter how advanced you are.
This is the perfect yoga practice to fit in no matter what! I so appreciate the no-music practice.  I choose a playlist that suits my mood and that really adds to my practice!!
Love this! I'm 65 years old with autoimmune arthritis, which means I am very stiff and sore in the mornings. This has helped tremendously!
